<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 63pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif">(e)</font><font id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab" style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif"><u>Sale of Shares by Charitable Trustee</u></font>.&#160; Within twenty (20) days of receiving notice from the Corporation that Shares have been transferred to the Charitable Trust, the Charitable Trustee shall sell the Shares held in the Charitable Trust to a person, designated by the Charitable Trustee, whose ownership of the Shares will not violate the ownership limitations set forth in Section&#160;10.2.(a).&#160; In connection with any such sale, the Charitable Trustee shall use good faith efforts to sell such Shares at a fair market price.&#160; Upon such sale, the interest of the Charitable Beneficiary in the Shares sold shall terminate and the Charitable Trustee shall distribute the net proceeds of the sale to the Prohibited Owner and to the Charitable Beneficiary as provided in this Section&#160;10.3.(e).&#160; The Prohibited Owner shall receive the lesser of (1)&#160;the price paid by the Prohibited Owner for the Shares or, if the Prohibited Owner did not give value for the Shares in connection with the event causing the Shares to be held in the Charitable Trust (e.g., in the case of a gift, devise or other such transaction), the Market Price of the Shares on the day of the event causing the Shares to be held in the Charitable Trust and (2)&#160;the price per share received by the Charitable Trustee (net of any commissions and other expenses of sale) from the sale or other disposition of the Shares held in the Charitable Trust.&#160; The Charitable Trustee may reduce the amount payable to the Prohibited Owner by the amount of dividends and distributions which have been paid to the Prohibited Owner and are owed by the Prohibited Owner to the Charitable Trustee pursuant to Section&#160;10.3.(c) of this Article&#160;X. Any net sales proceeds in excess of the amount payable to the Prohibited Owner shall be immediately paid to the Charitable Beneficiary.&#160; If, prior to the discovery by the Corporation that Shares have been transferred to the Charitable Trustee, such Shares are sold by a Prohibited Owner, then (i)&#160;such Shares shall be deemed to have been sold on behalf of the Charitable Trust and (ii)&#160;to the extent that the Prohibited Owner received an amount for such Shares that exceeds the amount that such Prohibited Owner was entitled to receive pursuant to this Section&#160;10.3.(e), such excess shall be paid to the Charitable Trustee by the Prohibited Owner upon demand.&#160; The Charitable Trustee shall have the right and power (but not the obligation) to offer any Shares held in trust for sale to the Corporation on such terms and conditions as the Charitable Trustee shall deem appropriate.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 63pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif">(f)</font><font id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab" style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif"><u>Purchase Right in Shares Transferred to the Charitable Trustee</u></font>.&#160; Shares transferred to the Charitable Trustee shall be deemed to have been offered for sale to the Corporation, or its designee, at a price per share equal to the lesser of (i)&#160;the price per share in the transaction that resulted in such transfer to the Charitable Trust (or, in the case of a devise or gift, the Market Price at the time of such devise or gift) and (ii)&#160;the Market Price on the date the Corporation,</font></div>

<div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP: 10pt">
<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-ALIGN: center">A-21</div>

<div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
</div>
</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-ALIGN: left">or its designee, accepts such offer.&#160; If the Corporation, or its designee, accepts such offer, the Corporation may reduce the amount payable to the Prohibited Owner by the amount of dividends and distributions which have been paid to the Prohibited Owner and are owed by the Prohibited Owner to the Charitable Trustee pursuant to Section&#160;10.3.(c) of this Article&#160;X and, if the Corporation, or its designee, elects to do so, the Corporation shall pay the amount of such reduction to the Charitable Trustee for the benefit of the Charitable Beneficiary. The Corporation shall have the right to accept such offer until the Charitable Trustee has sold the Shares held in the Charitable Trust pursuant to Section&#160;10.3.(e).&#160; Upon such a sale to the Corporation, the interest of the Charitable Beneficiary in the Shares sold shall terminate and the Charitable Trustee shall distribute the net proceeds of the sale to the Prohibited Owner and any dividends or other distributions held by the Charitable Trustee will be paid to the Charitable Beneficiary, each as provided in Section&#160;10.3.(e).</div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt">&#160;</div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 63pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif">(g)</font><font id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab" style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif"><u>Designation of Charitable Beneficiaries</u></font>.&#160; By written notice to the Charitable Trustee, the Corporation shall designate one or more nonprofit organizations to be the Charitable Beneficiary of the interest in the Charitable Trust such that (i)&#160;Shares held in the Charitable Trust would not violate the restrictions set forth in Section&#160;10.2.(a)&#160;in the hands of such Charitable Beneficiary and&#160;(ii)&#160;each such organization must be described in Sections&#160;501(c)(3), 170(b)(1)(A)&#160;or 170(c)(2)&#160;of the Code.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt">&#160;</div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">10.4</font><font id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab" style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><u>NYSE Transactions</u></font>.&#160; Nothing in this Article&#160;X shall preclude the settlement of any transaction entered into through the facilities of the NYSE or any other national securities exchange or automated inter-dealer quotation system.&#160; The fact that the settlement of any transaction </font>takes place shall not negate the effect of any other provision of this Article&#160;X and any transferee in such a transaction shall be subject to all of the provisions and limitations set forth in this Article&#160;X.</div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt">&#160;</div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">10.5</font><font id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab" style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><u>Enforcement</u></font>.<font style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font>The<font style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt"> </font>Corporation<font style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt"> </font>is<font style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt"> </font>specifically<font style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt"> </font>authorized<font style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt"> </font>to<font style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt"> </font>seek<font style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt"> </font>equitable<font style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt"> </font>relief,<font style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt"> </font>including<font style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt"> </font>injunctive<font style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt"> </font>relief,<font style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt"> </font>to<font style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt"> </font>enforce<font style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt"> </font>the<font style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt"> </font>provisions<font style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt"> </font>of this<font style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt"> </font>Article<font style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt"> </font>X.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt">&#160;</div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">10.6</font><font id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab" style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><u>Non-Waiver</u></font>.&#160; No delay or failure on the part of the Corporation or the Board of Directors in exercising any right hereunder shall operate as a waiver of any right of the Corporation or the Board of Directors, as the case may be, except to the extent specifically waived in writing.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt">&#160;</div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; COLOR: #0000ff"><u>ARTICLE XI</u></font><font id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab" style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt">&#160;</font></div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; COLOR: #0000ff; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><u>CONTROL SHARE ACQUISITION</u></div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left">&#160;</div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; COLOR: #0000ff"><u>11.1</u></font><font id="TRGRRTFtoHTMLTab" style="FONT-SIZE: 5.14pt">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; COLOR: #0000ff"><u>Affiliated Transactions</u></font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #0000ff"><u>.</u></font>&#160;<font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #008000"><u>The Corporation shall not be </u></font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; COLOR: #0000ff"><u>governed by Article&#160;14 (Affiliated Transactions) of the Virginia Stock Corporation Act.</u></font></font></div>

<div><br>
</div>

<div><br>
</div>

<div>&#160;</div>

<div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-ALIGN: center">A-22</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: normal">VOTE BY INTERNET - www.proxyvote.com</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: normal">Use the Internet to transmit your voting instructions and for electronic delivery of information up until 11:59 P.M. Eastern Time the day before the cut-off date or meeting date. Have your proxy card in hand when you access the web site and follow the instructions to obtain your records and to create an electronic voting instruction form.</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: normal">&#160;</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: normal">ELECTRONIC DELIVERY OF FUTURE PROXY MATERIALS</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: normal">If you would like to reduce the costs incurred by our company in mailing proxy materials, you can consent to receiving all future proxy statements, proxy cards and annual reports electronically via e-mail or the Internet. To sign up for electronic delivery, please follow the instructions above to vote using the Internet and, when prompted, indicate that you agree to receive or access proxy materials electronically in future years.</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: normal">&#160;</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: normal">VOTE BY PHONE - 1-800-690-6903</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: normal">Use any touch-tone telephone to transmit your voting instructions up until 11:59P.M. Eastern Time the day before the cut-off date or meeting date. Have your proxy card in hand when you call and then follow the instructions.</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: normal">&#160;</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: normal">Mark, sign and date your proxy card and return it in the postage-paid envelope we have provided or return it to Vote Processing, c/o Broadridge, 51 Mercedes Way, Edgewood, NY 11717.</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: left">The Board of Directors recommends you vote FOR the following:</div>

</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; BORDER-BOTTOM: medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; WIDTH: 5%">&#160;</td>
<td style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; BORDER-BOTTOM: medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; WIDTH: 5%">
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: center">For</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif">All</font><font style="FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif">&#160;</font></div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: center">&#160;</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; TEXT-ALIGN: center">&#9744;</div>
</td>
<td style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; BORDER-BOTTOM: medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; WIDTH: 5%">
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: center">Withhold</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: center">All</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: center">&#160;</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; TEXT-ALIGN: center">&#9744;</div>
</td>
<td style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; BORDER-BOTTOM: medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; WIDTH: 5%">
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: center">For All</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: center">Except</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: center">&#160;</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; TEXT-ALIGN: center">&#9744;</div>
</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; BORDER-BOTTOM: medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; WIDTH: 1%">&#160;</td>
<td style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; BORDER-BOTTOM: medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; WIDTH: 30%">
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-ALIGN: left">To withhold authority to vote for any</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-ALIGN: left">individual nominee(s), mark &#8220;For All </div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-ALIGN: left">Except&#8221; and write&#160; the&#160; number(s) of&#160; the</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-ALIGN: left">nominee(s) on the&#160;line below.</div>
</td>
<td style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top; BORDER-BOTTOM: medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; WIDTH: 5%">&#160;</td>

</tr>

<div>
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN-LEFT: 237.8pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 229.95pt">APPLE HOSPITALITY REIT, INC.</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN-LEFT: 237.7pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 229.8pt">Annual Meeting of Shareholders</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN-LEFT: 245.75pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 237.8pt">May 18, 2017 11:00 AM EDT</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN-LEFT: 211.75pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 203.9pt">This proxy is solicited by the Board of Directors</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt">&#160;</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt">&#160;</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt">&#160;</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt">&#160;</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt">&#160;</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt">&#160;</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt">
<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">This proxy is solicited by the Board of Directors. The undersigned hereby appoints Bryan Peery and David Buckley as Proxies, each with the power to appoint his substitute, and hereby authorizes each of them to represent and to vote, as designated below, all common shares of Apple Hospitality REIT, Inc. held by the undersigned on March 24, 2017, at the Annual Meeting of Shareholders at the Courtyard and Residence Inn Richmond Downtown located at 1320 East Cary Street, Richmond, Virginia 23219, on Thursday, May 18, 2017 at 11:00 a.m., eastern daylight time, or any adjournment thereof. If one of the director nominees specified below ceases to be available for election as a director, discretionary authority may be exercised by each of the Proxies named herein to vote for a substitute.</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>

<div style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">THIS PROXY WHEN PROPERLY EXECUTED WILL BE VOTED IN THE MANNER DIRECTED HEREIN BY THE UNDERSIGNED SHAREHOLDER. IF NO DIRECTION IS MADE, THIS PROXY WILL BE VOTED &#8220;FOR&#8221; THE NOMINEES IN PROPOSAL 1, &#8220;FOR&#8221; PROPOSALS 2, 4, 5A, 5B, 5C and 5D, FOR &#8220;1 YEAR&#8221; FOR PROPOSAL 3, AND ACCORDING TO THE DISCRETION OF THE PROXY HOLDERS ON ANY OTHER MATTERS THAT MAY PROPERLY COME BEFORE THE ANNUAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS.</div>
